name: UBOAT SOP: Turn On Red Light
description:
[h1]UBOAT Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)[/h1]
[h3]Turn On Red Light[/h3]

Part of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3322088593]UBOAT Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)[/url] collection.

This mod will have a crewman turn on the red light under the following conditions:
[list][*] The boat is not alarmed
[*] It is night time
[*] The boat has normal lighting (will not switch if blue)
[*] The boat will switch to white lights during the daytime if the red lights are on (not blue)
[/list]

Does not require a new game. May disable achievements (I don't really know)

[h3]Debugging[/h3]

Before reporting a bug, please make sure of the following:

[*] The mod is enabled
[*] You have read the conditions under which the mod will work
[*] You have checked that no other mods may be interfering
[*] You have checked in the file %USERPROFILE%\AppData\LocalLow\Deep Water Studio\UBOAT\output_log.txt that there is a line that reads 'UBOATSOP_TurnOnRedLight Version 2024.1.13.15'[/list]

[h3]Source Code[/h3]

Source code is available on Github, here: https://github.com/Andargor/UBOATSOP

NOTE: Any mods on github that have not been released in the Steam Workshop are WORKS IN PROGRESS and may break your game. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK
